segments.text: How many children do Cindy and Ron have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They have two children-one son and one daughter-as well as one daughter-in-law and one son-in-law .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , they have three grandchildren-one girl and two boys .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does their daughters get along well with her in-laws ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , she gets along with them quite well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do they have a large family ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Their family is very similar to Cindy and Ron ’ s family .
segments.speaker: S2
